getPreviewPricePerVaultShare().notice: get the total amount of assets received if shares are actually redeemedhttps://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4626

getPricePerVaultShare().notice: Returns the amount of underlying tokens each share of a vault is worth.

getStateRegistryId().notice: get the state registry id associated with the vault

getTotalAssets().notice: get the total amount of underlying managed in the ERC4626 vault

getTotalSupply().notice: get the total amount of unredeemed vault shares in circulation

getVaultDecimals().notice: Returns the number of decimals in a vault for accounting purposes

getVaultName().notice: Returns the name of the vault.

getVaultShareBalance().notice: Returns the amount of vault shares owned by the form.

getVaultSymbol().notice: Returns the symbol of a vault.
